commands



C_COMMAND_MAX

#define C_COMMAND_MAX 256
type: C preprocessor definition
description: maximum number of commands in interpreter

C_COMMAND_NOT_FOUND

#define C_COMMAND_NOT_FOUND -0xff
type: C preprocessor definition
description: command not found error code

C_NULL_COMMAND

#define C_NULL_COMMAND { "", "", "", NULL }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: NULL command initialization

command_func

typedef int (*command_func)(int, char**);
type: C typedef
description: command function type

Command

typedef struct {
  char         name[32];
  char         args[128];
  char         description[256];
  command_func function;
} Command;
type: C struct
description: command struct

gc_null_command

extern const Command gc_null_command;
type: C variable
description: NULL command

CommandInterpreter

typedef struct {
  Command commands[C_COMMAND_MAX];
} CommandInterpreter;
type: C struct
description: interpreter, array of Commands

c_interpreter_init

bool c_interpreter_init(CommandInterpreter *itp, Command *commands[]);
type: C function
description: initialize interpreter with command array (terminated by NULL command)

c_interpreter_add_commands

bool c_interpreter_add_commands(CommandInterpreter *itp, Command *commands[]);
type: C function
description: add command array (terminated by NULL command) to interpreter

c_interpreter_add_command

bool c_interpreter_add_command(CommandInterpreter *itp, Command *command);
type: C function
description: add command to interpreter

c_interpreter_execute

int  c_interpreter_execute(CommandInterpreter *itp, int argc, char *argv[]);
type: C function
description: run arguments through interpreter

c_interpreter_print

void c_interpreter_print(CommandInterpreter *itp);
type: C function
description: print commands name & arguments

Args

typedef struct {
  uint  argc;
  cstr *argv;
} Args;
type: C struct

args_var

#define args_var(name) Args name = { 0, NULL }
type: C preprocessor definition

c_args_free

void c_args_free(Args *args);
type: C function

c_args_parse

void c_args_parse(Args *args, const char *text);
type: C function
